name: Undergraduate Teaching Assistant
description: From August 2021 to Spring 2024 I worked as an undergraduate teaching assistant for various classes teaching C++ and software development fundementals.
responsibilities: Hold weekly office hours on Teams, where students can ask me questions about C++ or other course content, and request help when struggling with their code.
Attend in person recitations/labs, where I assist students by being there to answer any questions they might have.
Grade student C++ assignments based on their coding style, ranging from small programs to code bases consisting of several different files.

name: Software Intern
description: From May 31st 2023 - August 5th 2023, worked as a software intern for a 10 week program held by DISH.
responsibilities: Researched the implementation of networking solutions for Android TV devices.
Used Android Studio to implement applications using Java and XML to develop and test networking solutions.
Tested applications on Android TV devices using adb.
Analyzed large C++ code bases as part of my research and testing of networking solutions.
